Question: Epstein, fearing that fans would be alienated by the idea of a married Beatle, asked the ____s to keep their marriage secret.
Hints: Seven years this person's senior, Parkes took him on trips and to local cinemas.
This person was on tour when his first son, Julian, was born in April.
This person detailed this period in the Beatles' song "The Ballad of John and Yoko".
